predicate.note: Frames file for 'station' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Placing.

roleset.name: put military people in a place

example.name: usually passive
example.text: The son of a Seagram's executive who [*T*-2] was stationed [*-1] in many countries around the world, Mr. McDonough was born in Tokyo and attended 19 schools in places ranging from Hong Kong to Shaker Heights, Ohio, before entering Dartmouth College.
